resp = client.search(
    runtime_mappings={
        "amount.signed": {
            "type": "double",
            "script": "\n        double amount = doc['amount'].value;\n        if (doc['type'].value == 'expense') {\n          amount *= -1;\n        }\n        emit(amount);\n      "
        }
    },
    query={
        "bool": {
            "filter": {
                "range": {
                    "amount.signed": {
                        "lt": 10
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    },
    fields=[
        {
            "field": "amount.signed"
        }
    ],
)
print(resp)
